name: Auto-Broker
postCreateCommand: cd /workspaces/auto-broker/api && pip install -r requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || pip install fastapi uvicorn sqlalchemy psycopg2-binary redis python-jose python-multipart passlib pydantic-settings python-socketio; cd /workspaces/auto-broker/dashboard && echo 'VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:8000' > .env && echo 'VITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:8000' >> .env
postStartCommand: cd /workspaces/auto-broker/api && nohup python main.py > /tmp/api.log 2>&1 &; cd /workspaces/auto-broker/dashboard && nohup npm run dev > /tmp/dashboard.log 2>&1 &
